title: Midday Crossing
description: Pedestrians cross a downtown Boston intersection during the middle of the day. Figures move in multiple directions as storefronts, street signs, and passing traffic frame the scene.

title: Bathers at Nantasket Beach No 1
description: Families and children gather along the shoreline at Nantasket Beach on a summer afternoon. Some wade in the shallows while others stand back, watching the water and the activity around them.

title: Bathers at Nantasket Beach No 2
description: A wide view of Nantasket Beach on a busy summer day, with beachgoers seated in chairs and tents while others move between sand and surf. The scene captures the density and casual pace of a crowded shoreline.

title: Downtown Crossing No 1
description: Downtown Crossing with pedestrians crossing between shops and buildings. The scene captures the steady flow of foot traffic and everyday movement through the city.

title: Fifth Floor View
description: A city intersection viewed from above, showing cars stopped in traffic and pedestrians crossing at the corner. Buildings, sidewalks, and street markings define the structure of the scene.

title: Hingham Farmers Market
description: Shoppers move through an outdoor market in Hingham, Massachusetts. Vendor tents, food stands, and small groups of people create a busy scene of casual browsing, conversation, and everyday activity.

title: Lunchtime Stroll
description: Pedestrians walk along a downtown Boston street during the lunch hour. Tall buildings, storefronts, and signage frame the steady movement of people passing through the city.

title: Northend Scene
description: Pedestrians walk along a narrow street in Bostonâ€™s North End, passing storefronts, signs, and a busy intersection. Streetlights, traffic signals, and parked cars frame the scene as people move through the neighborhood.

title: Outside Peet's
description: People gather and pass by outside a coffee shop on a busy downtown street. Pedestrians wait at the corner while others move through the intersection, with storefronts and traffic framing the scene.
